TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
It\'s down for 24 hours.

We\'ve been RPing for five hours, and I don\'t think we\'ve actually posted much at all.

This does not bode well.
Again... we need two forums up.

Two forums, that\'ll keep things veeeeeerrry.... organised....

Either way, think the forum we\'re using needs a better host.
And I just got online and the forums are down. How great.
Alright, for this topic. This is to warn people about any outages and to discuss possible fixes. I do have a 1TB Harddrive, so if I could somehow get that to work with the board, that would be good.

Apparently we\'ve exceeded the allotted bandwidth. I\'ve had enough of the hosting company, so I\'m moving to another in better hopes. It\'ll be a bit slower, but hopefully more stable. Also, I\'ve managed to save the site this time, so I have the entire thing sitting on my hard drive.

Also...

[mod]This thread is to be allowed to remain for civil discussion. Anything getting out of hand like the last thread will be dealt with.[/mod]
May we at least discuss certain things for the RP?
Yeah, can anyone bring me up to speed what has happened real quick?
Just remember guys, the official KSP forums aren\'t a \'\'Checkpoint\'\' or a refuge for you to fall back to if something off-site goes down.

> 
> Yeah, can anyone bring me up to speed what has happened real quick?

People posted.

The server was like \'no wai!\'

The server went down.

> 
> Yeah, can anyone bring me up to speed what has happened real quick?

Countries formed alliances and started space programs, and that was pretty much it so far.

> 
> People posted.
> 
> The server was like \'no wai!\'
> 
> The server went down.

Nnonon, in the RP.

> 
> Just remember guys, the official KSP forums aren\'t a \'\'Checkpoint\'\' or a refuge for you to fall back to if something off-site goes down.

Got it.

To be fair we need somewhere to keep updated, but maybe small talk should be kept to a minimum.

I suggest a Mailing List. 

People sign up for the KSPRP mailing list, and are eithe rPM\'ed on this forum, or are emailed updates about the RP!

This would include:

Forum downtime

Worldwide events

Other important goings-on.
There\'s this thing called twitter where you can send instant updates that anyone can see..
There is a thing called not everyone uses social networks.
Aww, the URL\'s been hijacked now...

> 
> There is a thing called not everyone uses social networks.

You don\'t need to have a twtter account to look at someone\'s messages; I do not have one but have been follow NASA and SpaceX tweets all week, no login or anything, just one URL ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Aww, the URL\'s been hijacked now...

Possibly because Radion has informed the host that he his displeased with their services.

And is preparing to move the forum to a new URL.

> 
> Possibly because Radion has informed the host that he his displeased with their services.
> 
> And is preparing to move the forum to a new URL.

Oh, okay.

How long will it approximately take? I mean, I can wait, but I\'d just like to know.

if you want a new serever

mady run you own server at you home?

all you need is a fast computer 

i have one at my house for my dads bisness

> 
> if you want a new serever
> 
> mady run you own server at you home?
> 
> all you need is a fast computer 
> 
> i have one at my house for my dads bisness

You realise we overrun the CPU of a web hosting service right? To have a server you\'d need both a fixed IP address and a dedicated machine, along with a load of other stuff.

> 
> There\'s this thing called twitter where you can send instant updates that anyone can see..

Yes, but I (and presumably some others) never use twitter. I rarely use my email at that, with all of it\'s 588 spam messages in inbox, majority of which are from stupid Facebook.

sorry 

i can ask my dad how to set up one the pm it to radion

> 
> - snip -
> 
> sorry 
> 
> i can ask my dad how to set up one the pm it to radion

Ain\'t gonna work kid, we know how to do it, but we either don\'t have the means to, or can\'t be bothered to.

Unless someone hopefully proves me wrong.
